title: Unit Coordination Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON)
Interview Descriptions: The interview process went quite well and it was a smooth process. I would highly recommend for those that are going to be interviewed, not to be nervous but to just simply prep
Interview Questions: What made you interested in this position

title: Lead Hand Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: Interview was good atmosphere. During the interview was okay. Couple of questions were difficult. I couldn't answer one question. They asked me 5 questions. Generally, leader ship and time management questions.
Interview Questions: Lots of leadership skill questions

title: Dietary Aide Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: It was in-person, got asked questions by a few people and got asked to physically show a task - imagine you are carrying a heavy box and move it from one side of the room to the other
Interview Questions: Pretend this garbage can is a heavy box and move it across the room

title: Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Mar 2023
Interview Descriptions: It was straight-forward and the interviewers were nice. It was a comfortable environment as a new nursing student with little experience. There were no hard questions, just general stuff that was primarily personality based.
Interview Questions: Describe a time you had an inter professional conflict?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: Zoom interview with manager and clinical educator. Interview was approximately 30 mins. Mostly situational questions. It took about one week to hear back from manager with an offer and accepted.
Interview Questions: Why should we hire you?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: The interview went well. The usual standard questions such as tell me about yourself, weakness and strengths, what are your previous experiences like . Some scenario based questions were also asked during the interview.
Interview Questions: How would you handle a patient refusing critical medical intervention?

title: Research Ethics Administrator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed occurred virtually via zoom by an interview panel. The interview team consisted of four people. The questions were of two kinds: technical, requiring job related knowledge, and about the personality traits. I also had to complete a pre interview assignment.
Interview Questions: How do you manage several tasks at limited frame?

title: Customer Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: 20 minutes long - standard interview questions: tell me about yourself, a time you showed that you can work in a team, how you showed compassion at work, can you multitask
Interview Questions: How have you shown compassion at work?

title: RPN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Toronto, ON) in Nov 2022
Interview Descriptions: Medium in a way that i can’t answer all of their questions but educational to all the interviewee. Have to review the position you are applying into. I just hope they would ask skill wuestions rather than theoretical since theoretical questions can be found in google
Interview Questions: I xNfjjjgdskk jgdryi dfjjuh scbbh

title: Communications Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: It was very pleasant and the team was very accommodating to my needs. The team was also very quick to respond to my emails and answer all my questions. Overall, the interview process was a very positive one.
Interview Questions: Why did you choose Trillium?

title: Manager of Research Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Aug 2022
Interview Descriptions: I applied directly on the Trillium website for the Manager of Research Programs at the Institute for Better Health. I was contacted by the recruitment manager by email, outlining the multi-step interview process and requesting me to complete the first round of written question & answers. I submitted those via email, and then was invited to a 45min virtual interview including a required 15min presentation on a set of information I was given in advance. I was initially pleased at their apparent clarity around the process, however after completing the interview process I can confirm it was quite disorganized and unprofessional. None of my emails were responded to and the emails I was sent for each part had spelling and grammatical mistakes from copy/pasting, the interview panel hadn’t read the answers I submitted in advance evidenced by the questions being asked again in the interview, no questions were asked about the 15min presentation I prepared, the interviewers were late to the interview and were openly discussing what questions to ask me (after the interview time had already started and I was on the call), and after over two months of waiting & follow ups they have entirely stopped communicating and ‘ghosted’ me without formal rejection.
Interview Questions:
Describe your management style
How would you support an anti-reactors workplace policy
Several multi-part (3+ questions within a question) that we’re lengthy for the panel to read and difficult to respond to accurately; one interviewer did offer to write the question out

title: Clinical Extern (Student Nurse) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: Online interview took place over Zoom with webcam on. It was very casual and easy going. Interviewer was friendly and added an opportunity for questions. Interview was short lasting only around 15 minutes.
Interview Questions: Describe a challenging encounter you had with a patient and how the steps you took to resolve it

title: Unit Coordinating Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Jun 2022
Interview Descriptions: Interview process isn’t hard it’s just super long when your contacted by the recruiter sometimes they aren’t sure of certain information and provide just a broad idea of what they think it would be. Sometimes the recruiters ghost you as well you send emails and there are absolutely no response…. That to me shows how I’d be treated in a position. But once you do get the ball rolling and you’ve reached first second and third stage it’s fairly simple, it’s much easier being an internal employee
Interview Questions: Tell me how you over came a difficult situation ?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: It was really smooth and positive interview.  Everyone acted in a  professional way. They asked for previous experience and study. They discussed the job offer and benefits. Next step was to clear one more interview.
Interview Questions: Tell me something about yourself?

title: Volunteer Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: I had a phone interview. I was told that they would let me know in one weeks time. However, still need to hear back from them. It was one-one interview.
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourself? 
Why do you want to work for us?

title: IT Support Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: Easy to get on board if you have a good reference and you have experience in similar field. On boarding process is very smooth as well.  Manager and team lead are supportive,
Interview Questions: What is your past experience

title: Registered Practical Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Dec 2021
Interview Descriptions: I applied online, got called for an interview within about 1 week. I was interviewed by 1 people and the interview lasted about 30 minutes. Overall very friendly and had no problem repeating questions when needed or providing information when I didn't understand a question. Pleasant interview.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Business Analyst Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: Included a detailed resume and application process with a call from a recruiter, followed by an interview on site with multiple staff members. Interview  questions were largely scenario based, with insightful discussion with future management
Interview Questions: What was one major lesson learned from your previous implementation

title: Registered Practical Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners in Oct 2021
Interview Descriptions:
Wondering how the interview process works at THP.
From first call to hiring. Also, how long is the orientation time with Trillium Health Partners?
Overall what is the experience like?
Is THP a good place to work?
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Support Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: The interview was quick and to the point. The manager asked questions about experience and your personal skills. I had an on call interview and then they asked me to come in for an in-person interview.
Interview Questions: Tell us about your work experience

title: IT Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Vancouver, BC)
Interview Descriptions: After submitting the application got a call scheduled within a week. For screening interview. The screening interviewer was rude and missy said if I wanted to continue seeing you can’t relocate in shorter time.
Interview Questions: Why can’t you move to move to Toronto in shorter time, I have people have their bags packed for the job

title: OneTHP Support Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: It was an average phone interview. The usual questions and lasted for like 15 min. The HR was nice and polite. Make sure to have a story to each question or can make up one. Also stay calm and go slow.
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourself.
How would you handle a difficult situation.
Weakness/Strengths

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: It was fairly easy. I had been applying for the CVH site for a long time, and I was able to get an interview thanks to an employee referral. But, in terms of the interview, it was your standard nursing interview questions; prioritization, scenario and behavioural questions.
Interview Questions: tell us about a time you had conflict with a coworker and how you solved it?

title: Physiotherapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: Zoom interview with 2 other individuals asking me questions. It started with questions about myself, why I chose physiotherapy, how do I feel like my skills/experiences will help me in the position I was applying for, and then it transitioned into all situational type questions where I was asked about a time when I was faced with a moral dilemma and when a family member was not agreeing with my treatment plan. They proceeded to ask me some more questions regarding my background in physiotherapy and what type of supervision I would need for the role since I am a new grad.
Interview Questions: Name a time where you exceeded someones expectations of you?

title: Strategy Management Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: I was asked only behavioural and situation questions. I was asked to walk through my resume and describe past experiences; where they would help me in this role. The interview was less than a half an hour
Interview Questions: Why Trillium? Why strategy? Situation dealing with confidential information

title: EMR Support Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions:
This was a phone interview because of COVID. They asked very basic questions, mostly scenario questions. 
Started off by asking why I wanted the job and why I was qualified for the job
Interview Questions: how would you handle a conflict situation. ex: doctor yells at you

title: Senior Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and heard back in about 2 weeks about the a phone interview. I had one interview with the manager and some senior staff. They were very friendly and asked a few standard questions.
Interview Questions: Tell us about yourself/walk us through your resume.

title: Trainer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: Short phone interview asking general questions, then presentation on any topic I wanted. the presentation was done in group setting and there was a feedback period at the end. overall it was engaging and interviewer was kind.
Interview Questions: How do you train people who are unwilling to learn?

title: HCP Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions:
Applied online and got a call back for in-person interview. Friendly panel interview with manager and coordinator. It took 2 weeks to hear back and process was very smooth and quick. 
Very professional leadership team made the interview setting comfortable.
Interview Questions: background education and experience

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions:
Apply through the Trillium Heath partner HR career website.  Then do an Interview with a leadership member. After the interview waiting for the result.
Then negociate the salary and position  and  process rest of procedure with HR
Interview Questions: Tell me about your self

title: Project Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: The interview follow-up process was fairly quick.  I received a response back from HR within a week offering time slots for the interview.  The interview itself was 1:1 and lasted  about 30 minutes.
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourself.
How do you monitor adherence to a project?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: Overall great experience. Simple scenario-based nursing questions, related to medicine. They asked soft questions about myself, my school experience, and my goals.  Two people panel during the interview. It was average.
Interview Questions: If a client is drowsy, what would you check first?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: Very efficient. Answers promptly to queries. Had my interview via phone. They were very accommodating. They asked me situational and practical questions. Personality questions as well to determine my overview especially in application at work.
Interview Questions: Situational. Allows you to process your thoughts critically

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners in Jun 2020
Interview Descriptions: A short interview, it was only like 20 minutes, it was also over the phone so there were 2 interviewers.  I got basic and situational interview questions and 2 medical type of questions. I hope this review will be helpful! I interviewed for a medicine unit.
Interview Questions: What is your greatest strength and how can you continue to improve your skills?

title: Registered Nurse, Emergency Room Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Jun 2020
Interview Descriptions:
Application via online, took approximately 1 month to get a follow up call. 

Over the phone interview (due to Covid restrictions) with 2 person panel (educator and manager). Relaxed.
Interview Questions:
Assessment questions i.e If a patient was having a heart attack, what would you assess, what orders would you anticipate, what is your priority? 

What values do you live by? 

5 year plan (like continuing education - ACLS, CC1)

title: IT Support Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions:
Tell it was seamless, I was asked a few behavioural questions, I was asked to tell me about yourself
Tell me about the projects you have worked on me about yourself.
Interview Questions:
Tell it was seamless, I was asked a few behavioural questions, I was asked to tell me about yourself
Tell me about the projects you have worked onme about yourself

title: OneTHP Support Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Brampton, ON) in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions: Very easy interview that was conducted over the phone. Seemed to already know they were hiring most people they were calling for interviews and were just screening for red flags. Asked fairly standard questions but not as in depth as a regular interview.
Interview Questions: What skills/qualifications do you bring to this role

title: TDR Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions: In-person (before COVID) and was in a room full of interviewers sitting at different desks, and each candidate had a 1:1 interview, but it was just in a room with other people getting interviewed as well.
Interview Questions: How would you handle a situation where the staff is getting frustrated with the computer?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON)
Interview Descriptions: Applied online and HR contacted me to schedule an onsite interview. The interview was with the manager and the clinical educator on the unit. The interview itself was conversational which I appreciated a lot. Even if I didn't get hired, it was a good experience and I have never felt so good after an interview before.
Interview Questions: Conflict, what happened, and what would you do next time?

title: Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON)
Interview Descriptions: Two weeks took place in the process after the interview. They ask to follow the process and joined orientation. One day set up training and really enjoyed it. Everyone was so nice and helpful.
Interview Questions: Q: Tell me about yourself?

title: Social Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview process takes a long time however it is a standard social work interview in terms of difficulty. Lots of scenario questions and lots of examples needed from past work experience
Interview Questions: Tell me about how past experiences relate to this position

title: RN Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and was called two weeks later. I had an interview with the manager and educator that lasted about half an hr. The manager offered me the position on the spot.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Maintenance Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 8 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: HR contacted me if I am interested in the position. When I responded, they took 2 weeks to get back to me and another 4 weeks to schedule the interview. Very sloppy HR staff.
Interview Questions: Technical, behavioral, situational

title: Recruiter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 7 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: Fair behavioural based interview with assignment. Panel interview taking turns asking questions and approximately 30 to 45 minutes. Fairly quick response rate after interview with results. Interviewers were pleasant and seemed to enjoy working there.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself and why you would be a good fitÉ

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: Had my consolidation in the unit. 30min talk with nurse manager, manage assistant and educator. Friendly and asked for my NCLEX exam date. Get a call back after 3 days for reference check, called back after 1 week with offer.
Interview Questions: What do you consider as culturally-competent care

title: Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Jun 2019
Interview Descriptions: Pretty informal interview. No behavioral questions. No academic questions like difference between interface and abstract class in OOP. Just where did you word, what did you do? You need to demonstrate your skills telling about your experience (if you want). Before interview I was sent to Epic Bridges test (Examiti).
Interview Questions: Tell me about your previous job

title: Pathologist Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Toronto, ON)
Interview Descriptions: I was not in town in the specified date and unfortunately, they did not accept an interview over the skype. They provided only 3 different times in one day to choose among. No other date was provided and the interview has to be in person with a physical presence. My email was responded rapidly.
Interview Questions: I was not in town and unfortunately, they did not accept an interview over the skype. They provided only 3 different times in one day to choose among.

title: Unit Coordination Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: It was a very relaxed interview. The interviewees made me feel comfortable. The questions were not too hard, very straightforward. I was interviewed by the charge nurse and the manager.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: Applied online and then was called for an interview. Interviewed with the manager and clinical educator for a medicine unit. HR contacted me a few days later for references and then was hired :)
Interview Questions: Describe a time you had to deal with conflict with a colleague.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: I had an interview at job fair .took about 25 min.easy interview .mostly conversation style .interviewers was friendly .asked about current work experience and education opportunities .one or two clinical scenarios.
Interview Questions: Conflict with a coworker?

title: Clinical Extern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: First, a resume and cover letter are submited, then a few weeks later an interveiw is schedule - there wasn't really any felixbility with times, the interview had the clinical educator and a charge nurse. They were both nice, but didn't give much away with whether they liked you or not, to my surprise they requested references a week or more later, they use an external company for that which is a little annoying,
Interview Questions: What goals have you set for yourself in clinical previously and how did you meet them?

title: Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Toronto, ON) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: applied like 4 weeks earlier, got it a bit later, during the interview the employer just kept talking and was so non-engaging as i was half asleep by the time she asked questions
Interview Questions: How do you deal with stress

title: Hospitality Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Oct 2018
Interview Descriptions: Trillium does a standard intevirew with standard questions to find out your decision making when at work  expect to be asked about conflicts, stealing, and unsafe work. Do a bit of research before hand
Interview Questions: What would i dod if i caught qn employye stealing

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: I was sent an email from the HR department saying I had been selected for an Interview. As a new grad this is very exciting and I prepared myself for this interview.
Interview Questions: I received an email 2 days later saying the email was an error and to continue to apply to other positions.

title: Registered Practical Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: I attended a job fair where they were conducting on the spot interviews. Depending on which department you were applying for the wait times varied. A department manager and an HR rep conducted the interview. They asked many standard questions that were printed out and they wrote down my responses on the printout. They asked me for a strength and a weakness of my character. They asked how I have resolved past conflicts. After they finished asking me questions they took a few minutes to discuss my destiny away from where I was sitting. They delivered the outcome of my interview. I got my response right away and then the interview was over.
Interview Questions: Explain a situation where you went above and beyond to deliver excellent care to a patient ?

title: Registered RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: 20 minute recruitment interview, I went to a job fair where they did on the spot interviews. It was 1 on one, general questions and friendly interviewers. The were slow to get back to me, but eventually did. General interview for multiple positions
Interview Questions: A time you have dealt with a conflict?

title: Summer Co-op Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: - Submitted an online application (questions, references), received an interview time slot (two interviewers were present who asked questions) via email, received an acceptance through email, confirmed acceptance of position
Interview Questions: How do you deal with stress?

title: RPN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, then had a two person interview. They were very pleasant ladies who understood what it meant to be a new grad on her first nursing interview. They made me very comfortable so the interview went great! I was offered a conditional offer on the spot pending the reference check. It was very easy to communicate with HR. Overall pleasant experience.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work on this unit?

title: Disinfection Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: very friendly, they repeated the question if you did not understand it. it was a pretty good experience taking into account the positive attitude of the interviewer. They were not rushing for the answers. It was a very positive experience.
Interview Questions: Achievements and some of the techniques used

title: Extern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: Late may receive an email, the interview was the day after. It was a two-person interview.  Parking is hard to get, so go early. HR emailed right after. Good questions, have several.
Interview Questions: what qualities would your friends call you?

title: Physiotherapist Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions: Series of questions from two managers in a very relaxed environment. Basic interview questions no curveballs. the interviewers were very easygoing and made you feel comfortable. Nothing else stood out in the interview process.
Interview Questions: Strengths and weaknesses

title: RPN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: I applied online, got called for an interview within about 2 or 3 weeks. I was interviewed by 2 people and the interview lasted about 30 minutes. Overall very friendly and had no problem repeating questions when needed or providing information when I didn't understand a question. Pleasant interview.
Interview Questions: Why I want to work there, my past experience, clinical scenario questions, prioritizing, team player questions.

title: Registered Practical Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Brampton, ON) in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: The hiring process was pretty simple: I got called in for an interview, I went in, did the interview in about the 30 min that was scheduled, and the next day I was asked for my references. I got offered the position about 2 weeks later.
Interview Questions: Long term goals

title: Senior Systems Administrator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: What should have been a simple phone screening turned into a phone rant by the interviewer.  The Talent Acquisition screener called an hour late.  Despite emailing me a few days prior to confirm the phone screening, she was still late.  By the time she called at the end of  day, she vented that she was very busy and was in a bad mood.  She also defended her lateness and mocked me for never experiencing an interviewer who's late.  I had cleared my entire day and prepared for this, only to be ruined by an unprofessional phone screener.  I offered to lighten the mood as she was capable of ruining my assessment.  She mentioned that the hiring manager pre-selected me for my qualifications and I was very excited.  She perfunctorily mentioned the next steps.  I called after a few days to confirm the panel interview but she never responded.  The actual phone screening lasted 2 minutes.  I cleared my whole and waited and hour for a haphazard 2-minute interview.
Interview Questions:
1. What makes you qualified to do this job.
2. Are you aware that this is just a contract?  A very short term contract?
3. How much (money) are you looking at(want)?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions: Microsoft 2000 testing on WORD, EXCEL and POWER POINT, met with a panel of 5 who asked very detailed and specific questions.  Checked all former references and requested I sign a disclosure
Interview Questions: What I can bring to the role

title: Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: Apply online and then get called by Human Resources for a Panel interview. One interview only. About 40 minutes. No testing or presentation for this one. Mostly behavioural questions during the interview. I'd say about 10 questions total. Waited about 1 week for a callback.
Interview Questions: Basic interview. Mostly behavioural questions. Also the "tell me about yourself" question.

title: Administrative Services Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions: The recruitment process was straight forward and as I expected. Human Resouces was respectful to explain the process. However they are slow with the recruitment process. The panel comprised of three, two Managers and one HR rep.
Interview Questions: Tell us about a time how you handled a difficult situation.

title: Unit Coordination Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON)
Interview Descriptions: I was called twice for Interview.  First the Hiring Manager then HR for typing , computer competency  and test for medical terminology.  The process was fair enough.
Interview Questions: Tell me something about yourself,  how can your background helped you with the position applied for and your goal for the next 5 years

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: Applied internally.   Standard interview stating your experience, weakness;strengths.  Answered clinical case scenario,medications and what would be the best patient care for certain health conditions.   Best strategy is to look confident, if you’re not sure of the answer be truthful and seek negative into positive.
Interview Questions: How do you deal with a difficult patient or coworker.

title: Store Keeper Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga Valley, ON) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: The interview process started over the phone where they asked more qualification questions.  The second part of the interview was an in person interview that had 2 interviewers. i was sat across from them as they asked me questions about my education, qualifications, and skills.
Interview Questions: What do you think a manager would expect from you other than your designated duties?

title: Registered Practical Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: Pretty straight forward. Applied through company website and got a call for an interview within 2 weeks. Easy communication with HR.  Interviewed with 2 people. Interview was about half an hour with questions from both. Got a call for references by the end of the week. Got an offer within a week from then. Overall, positive experience.
Interview Questions: Mostly situational questions - conflict that you've dealt with, skills, strengths / weaknesses, priority pt. etc.

title: Screener Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON)
Interview Descriptions: Quick two person interview. They talked about position and then asked if I was okay with it. Very pleasant encounter and expressed their commitment of ongoing support. Asked me about my exposure to diverse and vulnerable population in area
Interview Questions: Are you comfortable working at an inner city hospital.

title: Research Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 months. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: The process took way too long and there was zero communication between interviews. This was not an ideal process for attracting talent. I was not able to get in touch with anyone to negotiate the terms of my contract as my calls and messages were ignored. This was concerning and suggested that this would not be a good place to work
Interview Questions: What was your biggest accomplishment/ failure.

title: Network Administrative Role - Interview Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Dec 2015
Interview Descriptions:
My First interview was taken by the hiring manager on the phone, She liked me and shortlisted for the 2nd interview. 

I went for the 2nd interview and it was long long interview i ever had in my professional life almost 1 hour 45 minutes all based on behavioral interview. They asked total 15 questions and they were expecting long detailed answers of all of them to check my behavior. I did very well in this interview.
Interview Questions: Tell us about yourself.

title: Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners
Interview Descriptions: Easy interview, basic questions that are all super easy to answer. There were three interviewers, two questions each. The length of the interview was about 10 minutes in total. It is just a volunteer position so it's not scary at all and if you've made it as far as the interview you have already got the job. I was contacted the next day.
Interview Questions: How would others describe you?

title: Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Jul 2015
Interview Descriptions: Took long time to process application, interview process took maybe a week, acquisition of forms only took about 2 weeks. Orientation and training was over the course of two days.
Interview Questions: Tell me one interesting fact about yourself.

title: Financial Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON)
Interview Descriptions: Straight forward interview questions. Mostly behavioral based interview that focused on dealing with specific situations that you would encounter as a financial analyst/consultant. Panel based interview with a number of staff members. Overall it was straight forward and not as difficult as other interviews that I have been on. It is beneficial to review funding for hospitals to help you with the interview.
Interview Questions: Tell me a time that you dealt with a difficult client?

title: Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: all about critical thinking and client centred care. Manager and educator asked me to describe myself as a nurse and why I chose to work at medical surgical unit. Will ask about recent experience, your duties and responsibilities where you are currently working and the reason why are you leaving your current unit
Interview Questions: what is client centred care

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: After 3 weeks, I was called by manager for interview. One on one interview with manager. Educator was on vacation but was supposed to join us. Background check, reference check, and then HR called with job offer. Had to set up appointment with occupational health prior to orientation. 1 week hospital orientation then unit specific orientation.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here? What do you like about this population? Tell me about yourself. Conversation style.

title: Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Mississauga, ON) in Feb 2012
Interview Descriptions:
good, lots of question, back ground history, work history. Education was discusses as I just finished school. Reviewed no experience in medical cause past was accounting.  I then reviewed salary expectations and what my boss wanted to pay hourly and what I expected to be paid.
I got the job in the end.
Interview Questions: Conflict resolution

title: Software Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Trillium Health Partners (Toronto, ON) in Jan 2010
Interview Descriptions: Genral and technical interview on same day
Interview Questions: Asp .net life Sycle
